f_template.body:
<launch> <arg name="umrf_base_path" default="$(find $(arg ta_package_name))/test"/> <arg name="umrf_graph_file" default="umrf_graph.txt"/> <arg name="wake_word" default="temoto_ws"/>
<node name="parser_node" pkg="temoto_action_engine" type="parser_node" output="screen" args="$(arg umrf_base_path) $(arg umrf_graph_file) $(arg wake_word)"/> </launch>
